examples.example: 我们的城市通过不断努力，创造了百亿的经济价值，发展前景一片光明。

translate.english: Our city has created economic value of tens of billions through continuous efforts, and the development prospects are very bright.

examples.example: 这家企业凭借创新和拼搏，成功创造了百亿的辉煌业绩。

translate.english: This enterprise, by virtue of innovation and hard work, has successfully created a brilliant performance of tens of billions.

examples.example: 我们国家的科技投入逐年增加，有望在未来创造百亿的科研成果转化价值。

translate.english: The scientific and technological investment of our country increases year by year, and it is expected to create a value of tens of billions of scientific research achievements transformation in the future.
